caption: UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson meets European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen, in Brussels. The two met to discuss the Brexit trade deadlock after months of talks failed to reach an agreement.

result.explanation: The image clearly shows UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson and European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen meeting in what seems to be Brussels.  The flags of the UK and EU are visible in the background, supporting the context of a Brexit-related meeting. All entities are correctly identified and their presence is consistent with the image content. The caption's description aligns perfectly with the visual evidence.
